history.proof: intros y l x z Hredu Hweak. induction l using Lbl_ind. - apply tau_weak with y. + apply Hredu. + apply Hweak. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros y l x z Hredu Hweak.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros y l x z Hredu Hweak. induction l using Lbl_ind. - apply tau_weak with y. + apply Hredu. + apply Hweak. - destruct Hweak as [a [Hcomp1 Hcomp2]]. apply comp with y. + apply Hcomp1. + apply comp with a. * apply Hcomp2. * apply star_refl.
